message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's split it closer to even this time.
I'm not budging, I need the majority of the cash!

This is my final offer, Alice. Take it or leave it!
Bob, we're running out of time. This is my last offer.  I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I need something reasonable.
I'm not going to get taken advantage of. You'll get a tiny bit, but I'm keeping the majority!
